languages.text: {n}Голос Хейнрикса холодеет, как и его взгляд.{/n} "Понятно. Полагаю, в будущем я смогу продолжить свои изыскания самостоятельно".
{n}Heinrix's voice hardens, as does his stare.{/n} "Understood. I suppose I can conduct my investigation alone from now on."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Хейнрикса холодеет, как и его взгляд.{/n} "Понятно. Полагаю, в будущем я смогу продолжить свои изыскания самостоятельно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's voice hardens, as does his gaze.{/n} "Understood. I suppose I can conduct my investigation alone from now on."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's voice hardens, as does his gaze.{/n} "Understood. I suppose I can conduct my investigation alone from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's voice hardens, as does his stare.{/n} "Understood. I suppose I can conduct my investigation alone from now on."

languages.text: {n}海因里希的声音变得冷硬，目光也变得冷漠。{/n}“明白了，看来从现在开始，我得单独进行调查了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice hardens, as does his stare.{/n} "Understood. I suppose I can conduct my investigation alone from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的声音变得冷硬，目光也变得冷漠。{/n}“明白了，看来从现在开始，我得单独进行调查了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz de Heinrix se vuelve más severa, al igual que su mirada.{/n} «Entendido. Supongo que deberé proseguir con mi investigación por cuenta propia a partir de ahora».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice hardens, as does his stare.{/n} "Understood. I suppose I can conduct my investigation alone from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Heinrix se vuelve más severa, al igual que su mirada.{/n} «Entendido. Supongo que deberé proseguir con mi investigación por cuenta propia a partir de ahora».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの視線と声が固いものになる。{/n}「わかりました。これからは、我独りで調査を進めましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice hardens, as does his stare.{/n} "Understood. I suppose I can conduct my investigation alone from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの視線と声が固いものになる。{/n}「わかりました。これからは、我独りで調査を進めましょう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Stimme wird hart, genau wie sein Blick.{/n} "Verstanden. Das bedeutet wohl, dass ich meine Untersuchung von nun an alleine fortführen kann."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice hardens, as does his stare.{/n} "Understood. I suppose I can conduct my investigation alone from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Stimme wird hart, genau wie sein Blick.{/n} "Verstanden. Das bedeutet wohl, dass ich meine Untersuchung von nun an alleine fortführen kann."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix d'Heinrix se durcit, tout comme son regard.{/n} « Compris. Je suppose que je peux continuer mon enquête seul. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice hardens, as does his stare.{/n} "Understood. I suppose I can conduct my investigation alone from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix d'Heinrix se durcit, tout comme son regard.{/n} « Compris. Je suppose que je peux continuer mon enquête seul. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in sesi ve bakışları dikleşiyor.{/n} "Anlaşıldı. Sanırım soruşturmamın kalan kısmını tek başıma tamamlayabilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice hardens, as does his stare.{/n} "Understood. I suppose I can conduct my investigation alone from now on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in sesi ve bakışları dikleşiyor.{/n} "Anlaşıldı. Sanırım soruşturmamın kalan kısmını tek başıma tamamlayabilirim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
